summary:
Thank you download Chitama Princess Followers.
Thanks to a number of mod makers in preparing.
Equipped with Okame's simple healer recipe.
Please do not redistribute.
descriptionHtml:
I'm not good at English.
And rude in the machine translation.


Thank you download Chitama Princess Followers.
Thanks to a number of mod makers in preparing.
Equipped with Okame's simple healer recipe.
Please do not redistribute.

Add the five followers to skyrim, following location and class.

Platina tank Park one-handed weapon and shield. Sleeping Giant
Celes Archer  Bow Park. Sleeping Giant
Ratil Fighter Park of the two-handed weapon. Riverwood Trader second floor.
Kanade Thief One-handed weapon Park and the possible dual wield.  River Wood Trader second floor.
Ryin wizard  degree not too strong magic Park and a simple 3 attributes of magic. Riverwood Trader second floor.

Five common, healing shout and SeveNBase Bombshell Body.

CREDITS

SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?
